title: Organization Purpose Schema
description: Standardized enumeration of primary organizational motivations and purposes in The Shadow Team Chronicles universe.

descriptions.description: Detailed explanations of each organizational purpose (not part of the enum, provided for documentation)

profit_generation.description: Creating financial gain for owners, shareholders, or members through commercial activities.

political_power.description: Acquiring and exercising influence over governance or policy decisions at various levels.

social_change.description: Transforming societal structures, norms, values, or practices according to a vision.

knowledge_pursuit.description: Discovery, development, or preservation of information, techniques, or understanding.

security_provision.description: Protecting people, assets, information, or territories from various threats.

resource_control.description: Maintaining authority over access to or distribution of valuable materials or supplies.

religious_promotion.description: Advancing spiritual beliefs, practices, traditions, or religious institutions.

cultural_preservation.description: Maintaining and protecting traditions, languages, arts, or ways of life.

territorial_defense.description: Protecting geographic areas from external threats or competing claims.

technological_advancement.description: Creating or improving tools, techniques, or systems that expand capabilities.

ideological_spread.description: Expanding the adoption of specific philosophical, political, or belief systems.

entertainment_creation.description: Producing content, experiences, or activities designed for enjoyment or diversion.

infrastructure_development.description: Building or maintaining fundamental facilities and systems serving a common need.

public_service.description: Providing essential functions that benefit the general population.

community_support.description: Offering assistance, resources, or care to specific groups or localities.

environmental_protection.description: Preserving natural ecosystems, reducing harmful impacts, or restoring damaged areas.

criminal_enterprise.description: Generating profit or power through activities outside legal frameworks.

power_projection.description: Demonstrating strength and extending influence beyond immediate boundaries.

survival_assurance.description: Focusing primarily on ensuring the continued existence of its members or constituency.

magical_mastery.description: Developing, controlling, or understanding supernatural forces or arcane knowledge.

historical_documentation.description: Recording, preserving, and interpreting past events and developments.
